text:
Any ideas how to use contact’s email when running custom object based workflow? I would like to trigger webhook with the associated contact’s email :thinking_face:

<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/Workflows/How-do-I-use-webhooks-with-HubSpot-Workflows|Webhook help article> gives a good overview but says nothing getting email address to the request.
If you could go into detail about what it is you want to achieve maybe we can help you a little better <@UJLMJNX6G>
What is the relationship between your contact's email and the custom object?
